title: Hello. Recently, I was tempted by the new Pixel 3a from aliekspress because, unfortunately, there is
content: Hello. Recently, I was tempted by the new Pixel 3a from aliekspress because, unfortunately, there is no official distribution in Poland and I must admit that it was impressive, the dimensions of the operation and the apartment, just stole my rast. Unfortunately, after three weeks it stopped working, no coverage and no charging. Maybe someone had a similar case and knows how to fix it?
